Articles.Content:
Was just watching EJ_SA and came up with the idea that Squad should implement an action for your kerbals that is toggled and can be assigned to an action group .......

The Fonzy/Watney thumbs up for after you survive a crash

Thoughts?
Yes, that is truly an ingenious idea (seriously, I'm not even being sarcastic here)!
Neat idea, but I think that needs to be an automatic feature when you EVA, from a crashed ship.  If it's an action group then I think most of us just won't bother after the first few times.
